# Instructions on How to Obtain the Data

The following is the instructions on how to obtain the data,

1.  Go to IPUMS https://usa.ipums.org/usa/
2.  Then click “get data”
3.  Click select samples
4.  Unselect Default samples from each year and select ACS 2022. Then click samle selctions
5.  Then select vaiable by using the search function under harmonized variables to search for STATEICP and EDUC
6.  Once both are added go to cart
7.  Click create data extract. Change the data format to csv. Submit extract.
8.  Download the csv.
